pkgmetadata.longdescription: Optimal Subset Matching with Refined Covariate Balance // Tools for optimal subset matching of treated units and control units in observational studies, with support for refined covariate balance constraints, (including fine and near-fine balance as special cases). A close relative is the 'rcbalance' package. See Pimentel, et al.(2015) doi:10.1080/01621459.2014.997879 and Pimentel and Kelz (2020) doi:10.1080/01621459.2020.1720693. The rrelaxiv package, which provides an alternative solver for the underlying network flow problems, carries an academic license and is not available on CRAN, but may be downloaded from Github at https://github.com/josherrickson/rrelaxiv/.
